elements.name: Skill level
elements.title: Skill level
elements.description: How technically skilled is this group of threat agents? No technical skills (1), some technical skills (3), advanced computer user (5), network and programming skills (6), security penetration skills (9),

elements.name: Motive
elements.title: Motive
elements.description: How motivated is this group of threat agents to find and exploit this vulnerability? Low or no reward (1), possible reward (4), high reward (9)

elements.name: Opportunity
elements.title: Opportunity
elements.description: What resources and opportunities are required for this group of threat agents to find and exploit this vulnerability? Full access or expensive resources required (0), special access or resources required (4), some access or resources required (7), no access or resources required (9)

elements.name: Size
elements.title: Size
elements.description: How large is this group of threat agents? Developers (2), system administrators (2), intranet users (4), partners (5), authenticated users (6), anonymous Internet users (9)

elements.name: Ease of discovery
elements.title: Ease of discovery
elements.description: How easy is it for this group of threat agents to discover this vulnerability? Practically impossible (1), difficult (3), easy (7), automated tools available (9)

elements.name: Ease of exploit
elements.title: Ease of exploit
elements.description: How easy is it for this group of threat agents to actually exploit this vulnerability? Theoretical (1), difficult (3), easy (5), automated tools available (9)

elements.name: Awareness
elements.title: Awareness
elements.description: How well known is this vulnerability to this group of threat agents? Unknown (1), hidden (4), obvious (6), public knowledge (9)

elements.name: Intrusion detection
elements.title: Intrusion detection
elements.description: How likely is an exploit to be detected? Active detection in application (1), logged and reviewed (3), logged without review (8), not logged (9)

elements.name: Confidentiality
elements.title: Confidentiality
elements.description: How much data could be disclosed and how sensitive is it? Minimal non-sensitive data disclosed (2), minimal critical data disclosed (6), extensive non-sensitive data disclosed (6), extensive critical data disclosed (7), all data disclosed (9)

elements.name: Integrity
elements.title: Integrity
elements.description: How much data could be corrupted and how damaged is it? Minimal slightly corrupt data (1), minimal seriously corrupt data (3), extensive slightly corrupt data (5), extensive seriously corrupt data (7), all data totally corrupt (9)

elements.name: Availability
elements.title: Availability
elements.description: How much service could be lost and how vital is it? Minimal secondary services interrupted (1), minimal primary services interrupted (5), extensive secondary services interrupted (5), extensive primary services interrupted (7), all services completely lost (9)

elements.name: Accountability
elements.title: Accountability
elements.description: Are the threat agentsâ€™ actions traceable to an individual? Fully traceable (1), possibly traceable (7), completely anonymous (9)

elements.name: Financial damage
elements.title: Financial damage
elements.description: How much financial damage will result from an exploit? Less than the cost to fix the vulnerability (1), minor effect on annual profit (3), significant effect on annual profit (7), bankruptcy (9)

elements.name: Reputation damage
elements.title: Reputation damage
elements.description: Would an exploit result in reputation damage that would harm the business? Minimal damage (1), Loss of major accounts (4), loss of goodwill (5), brand damage (9)

elements.name: Non-compliance
elements.title: Non-compliance
elements.description: How much exposure does non-compliance introduce? Minor violation (2), clear violation (5), high profile violation (7)

elements.name: Privacy violation
elements.title: Privacy violation
elements.description: How much personally identifiable information could be disclosed? One individual (3), hundreds of people (5), thousands of people (7), millions of people (9)
